content:
Picasa is probably a 32-bit app, and your TB is probably 64-bit. Although 64-bit TB communicates with FastStone, Picasa might work better with 32-bit TB. Remove TB 64-bit, then install TB 32-bit:

https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/all/

Make sure TB is set as the default in Windows Settings and in TB Settings/General/System Integration.
creator: sfhowes

content: Accounts can be reordered by drag and drop in Account Settings.
creator: sfhowes
